page.title: 05Park Farm Dumfries
page.content: Park farm is situated in the south west of the Maxwelltown area in Dumfries. It is made up of a big show field, a small cattle and horse farm a grazing field and a paddock. A lady called Mrs Bell owns the small farm and Dumfries and Galloway Agricultural council own the showfield. A farmer who doesn't actually live on the farm owns the grazing field and paddock. The grazing field and paddock are used for cattle and horses, the farm is only used for cattle and horses, and the showfield is used for special events such as the circus, the vintage car show and any other spectacular events like that.
